Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have good news to share today. We now have a new member on our dev team.

I think most of you already know him. He goes by the name of C7Studios on the forums.

So give a warm welcome to Chad 'C7' Jenkins, our newest KSP dev!

Cheers

I\'m very excited to start working with team! The future is very bright indeed. I am also pleased to announce that the 'C7 Flight pack' will be included as official content in the future!

-C7

Oh SNAP!

Well done. Your parts have definitely added a side to the game that has made it much more entertaining!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

HOOLLLY.

I love you Harvester.

C7, you are my hero.

Dear god the awesomeness is to much to grasp.

My brain nearly exploded from the awesomeness of this.

HarvesteR, are you trying to kill me?
Congrats C7!!
Brilliant job good sir! Congratulations!

I\'m very pleased to hear that all that talent and hard work have... let you in for lots more hard work! ;P

Congratulations!

Congrats man, I can\'t even comprehend what this means to KSP and you yourself.

With your pack in there (probably my favorite of all time) KSP will take giant leap towards completion

:cheers:
Holy moly! This is huge! Yay for more awesome airplane parts in the future!

Holy super-kerbal-fragilistic-explosion-lidocious! ;D

Congrats C7 and congrats SQUAD with this enormous talent!

This makes the KSP stock items spuer great awesome I-dont-know-a-good-word.

I hope you\'ll all enjoy working together!

Congradulations!

May you both do some create work together...

There are no words left to express the sheer awesomness of this.

Congrats man

Holy freaking crapomatic, Batman!

My favorite game developer and my favorite game modder just merged. Wow.
Bravo, you really deserved it C7. Can\'t wait to see what you can do to help progress the game.

Epic win.

What is his job? Function? Title?

Congratz C7. Have fun and enjoy developing for Squad.

Ah crap, there goes my remaining free time

Seriously, very well done that gent!

All hail C7! :hailprobe:
Thank you for the kind words everyone! I\'m looking forward to getting down to work

Well, that was quite expectable

Congratulations man! :thumbup:

Congratulation C7!

So... When do we get horizontal launches?
My brain is on fire. I\'m assuming C7 will give us some stock spaceplane parts, horizontal launches, etc...?

... missed this post.

Read C7\'s announcement in the C7 thread, which was posted today.

You can\'t blame me for thinking it was an April Fools\' joke! STOP BLAMING ME!
Yay! Congratulations!
My brain cannot handle the amount of awesome in this post.
So what is your objective on the team, will you be continuing to develop parts for atmospheric/space flight or have you expressed interest in other parts of the game code?
